help.Directions:
##Step One
 Get the chicken in to the boat.
help.Hint:
##Hint
 The pickUp('item') gets puts whichever item you select into the boat.

help.Directions:
##Step Two
 Get the chicken to the other side of the river and drop it off.

##Step Three
 Go back to the first side of the river, pick up the grain, and drop it off with the chicken.

##Step Four
 Head back across the river to get the fox and drop it off on the other side of the river.
help.Hint:
##Hint
 The chicken will eat the grain if they are left together.

help.Directions:
##Step Five
 What if we change where the items are? Get the grain and bring it to the other side of the river.
help.Hint:
##Hint
 The fox will eat the chicken if they are left together.

help.Directions:
##Step Six
 Time to solve the entire problem. Help the farmer get all of his items across the river.

 Remember that the fox will eat the chicken and the the chicken will eat the grain if they are left alone.
